title: My game is zoomed in wrong angle
body:
Hey I dont know how to exactly describe it but after patching my game is like zoomed in or has a wrong angle it just feels wrong and is really not fun to play with. Resolutions are all the same and I did a client repair but it didnt fix it. I took some screenshots but Im not sure if you are able to see the problem I have.

http://imgur.com/a/aQLGW

replies.body:
Yes I have the exact same issue, made a thread, received no replies sadly.
I upgraded to a 1440p screen 3 days ago and the only game it has issues with is league.
Like in your pics it stretches the screen and makes everything look really weird, especially champions.

i have exactly the same problem, ive tried changing resoultions through the game and the .cfg file, and tried all the scaling options in nvidia control panel to no avail. i have also repaired and tried reinstalling league both didnt change the problem

Hmmmm it looks like you might be having the same problem as a number of other players who are running a native resolution of 2560x1440. We're still working on getting this ironed out as quickly as possible, and you can help us gather data and figure this out by shooting our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!
can confirm i have this issue and am running a native resolution of 1920x1080. It is apparently not exclusive to people using 2560x1440.

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=UUxQ03tz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-02T04:04:55.445+0000)
>
> Hmmmm it looks like you might be having the same problem as a number of other players who are running a native resolution of 2560x1440. We're still working on getting this ironed out as quickly as possible, and you can help us gather data and figure this out by shooting our tech guys a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)!

okey so should i just wait till you guys find a solution? Do I have to do anything afterwards or just wait?

By sending us a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), our tech guys will be able to gather more data from your system in order to figure out how this is happening for everyone. The tech guys may ask you for certain logs, so make sure to check for their responses. You'll be a part of the fix that ends up going out! ^_^

Yea that would be nice. 
I tried the ticket thing, the support person tried to get me to do things on my end.
Nothing helped. 
Hopefully they will fix it soon.
for me it works on euw only. if i switch to another region it doesnt work
